/events booking string Book Now Saturday, October 18, 2025\n9:00 AM - 12:00 PM\nBaguio City This hands-on workshop provides practical skills to significantly reduce food waste at home. Participants will learn the fundamentals of home composting methods suitable for small spaces and basic food preservation techniques like pickling and drying to extend the life of their produce.
